Uses of Interface
cn.spark2fire.jscrapy.Task

  • Packages that use Task 
    Package Description
    cn.spark2fire.jscrapy
    Main class "Spider" and models.
    cn.spark2fire.jscrapy.downloader
    Downloader is the part that downloads web pages and store in Page object.
    cn.spark2fire.jscrapy.pipeline
    Pipeline is the persistent and offline process part of crawler.
    cn.spark2fire.jscrapy.proxy  
    cn.spark2fire.jscrapy.scheduler
    Scheduler is the part of url management.
    cn.spark2fire.jscrapy.scheduler.component
    Component of scheduler.

    • Uses of Task in cn.spark2fire.jscrapy

      Classes in cn.spark2fire.jscrapy that implement Task 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Spider
      Entrance of a crawler.
      A spider contains four modules: Downloader, Scheduler, PageProcessor and Pipeline.
      Every module is a field of Spider.
      Methods in cn.spark2fire.jscrapy that return Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Task Site.toTask()
